definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: Of the use of advanced ultrasonic humidification humidification system.
sentences.chinese: 加湿系统采用先进的超声波加湿。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检查在卵泡膜细胞瘤诊断中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨B型超声对妇科急腹症的临床诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高频超声对跟腱损伤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Doppler ultrasound is part of the echocardiogram test.
sentences.chinese: 也是超声波心动图检查的一个部分。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.
sentences.chinese: 探讨彩色多普勒超声检查诊断睾丸附睾疾病的价值。

sentences.english: The ultrasonic hardness tester is an versatile nondestructive tester.
sentences.chinese: 超声硬度计是一种普适的无损测试仪器。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of B-Type ultrasonic diagnosis of clonorchiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨利用B型超声诊断华支睾吸虫病的临床价值。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: For arteriosus truncus and its branches, ultrasonography detection is not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 主干带小分支型皮瓣轴心动脉超声显像不难。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of echocardiography in tricuspid valve lesions (TVL).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价超声心动图对三尖瓣病变的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Ultrasonography is the main method for diagnosing fetal anomaly of multiparous pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 结论超声检查是产前诊断多胎异常的主要方法。

sentences.english: Design of multi-channel audio retrieval system based on melody;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种多声道超声气体流量计的电路设计。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an apparatus using ultrasonic to atomize liquids to tiny particles.
sentences.chinese: 一种利用超声波将液体雾化为微小颗粒的装置。

sentences.english: Data of the ultrasonographic diagnosis of 38 cases of liver hydatid disease are analysed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了38例肝包虫病超声显象诊断资料。

sentences.english: Machine parts of irregular shape can be washed very clean by ultrasonics.
sentences.chinese: 用超声波能把形状不规则的机件洗得很干净。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
Christian Johann Doppler, Austrian physicist who discovered the Doppler effect
